ygData.subject: Re: Temple of Solusek? (Brian comment?)
ygData.msgSnippet: [seems doubtful that there will be any hybrid quests available in the temple. casters do make up the vocal and actual majority of players out there. so, it
ygData.messageBody:
[seems doubtful that there will be any hybrid quests available in the
temple. casters do make up the vocal and actual majority of players out
there. so, it would seem likely our end of the spectrum would be overlooked
in a patch/update as it has been many times before. but on the brighter
side...unless verant has suddenly erased the benefits of npc slaugter...this
new zone could prove to be an excellent feeding ground for slayers like
ourselves.]

on another note...my standing with sol ro has gone rather sour as of
late...as my cohorts and i have released the souls of his worshippers
countless times. which leaves me to wonder...

how will he feel when i come knocking at his temple door?

-kg


>From: Chip Paul <cpaul@...>
>Reply-To: shadowknight@onelist.com
>To: shadowknight@onelist.com
>Subject: [shadowknight] Temple of Solusek? (Brian comment?)
>Date: Tue, 05 Oct 1999 10:07:34 -0500
>
>I explored this on the Test server, and it only had quests for
>Magicians, Necros, Enchanters, and clerics, alhough there were serveral
>other robed, named NPC's that may have wizard classes.
>
>There was not a soul wielding a sword in the whole place. Are they
>going to add in some quests for us there, or was it intended to be
>mage and cleric only?
>
>Xilith
>
